location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Pol Ext 16666/48 'Retention of British air crews in Persia'

physicalDescription.extent: The papers are arranged in approximate chronological order from the rear to the front of the file.

Foliation: the foliation sequence (used for referencing) commences at the front cover with 1, and terminates at the inside back cover with 7; these numbers are written in pencil, are circled, and are located in the top right corner of the recto side of each folio.

mods.abstract: Thefile contains papers regarding the detention of British aircraft in Persia.Folio 5 refers to the detention of three aircraft and their crew at Jask while en route to India. Folios 2-4 refer to the detention and subsequent release ofan aircraft with two crew and four passengers at Chahbar (Chabahar) while enroute to Afghanistan. The primary correspondents are: British High Commission,Karachi; British Legation, Tehran.The file includes a divider, which gives a list ofcorrespondence references contained in the file by year. This is placed at theback of the correspondence.
